tool_description: Optimizes course schedules using advanced algorithms to minimize conflicts, maximize room utilization, and improve student scheduling convenience.

constraint_weights.description: Relative importance weights for each criteria (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Criteria mismatch: optimization_criteria and constraint_weights arrays must have the same length.
Invalid criteria: One or more optimization_criteria are not supported.
Invalid weights: constraint_weights must be numbers between 0.0 and 1.0.
Empty schedule: current_schedule must contain at least one schedule entry.
Optimization failed: Unable to find improved schedule within constraints.
usage: Provide optimization_criteria, matching constraint_weights, and current_schedule. The tool will attempt to improve the schedule based on specified criteria and weights.

optimization_summary.description: Summary of optimization process and results
